title: (中學生吹雞) 614今晚9pm 社交媒體要人 #policebrutality

replies.msg:
［女學生被壓頸 國際戰線一齊打］​
​
天時，地利我地都齊，依家只係爭東風再起。​
美國 #antifa 嘅示威開始減弱，全世界嘅焦點都係 #policebrutality 。​
​
我地香港思流正正就係有兩位成員在12/6的和平街站中被捕，當中更有傳媒拍下警察以壓頸的方式，粗暴制服我們的成員。​
​
正值全世界反警察暴力，焦點亦可以翻返嚟香港。​
​
我地思流呼籲各位：​
今晚（14/6）21:00 準時在自己的social media post出右圖，再次向國際響起呼救的訊號。​
​
Format可以如下：​
There are students from #ideologisthk were attacked by the police by being suppressed on her neck and restrained on the ground, at totally peaceful atmosphere, to emphasize.​
​
We sincerely hope that people - no matter you're living in Hong Kong, or places across the continents - to pay attention to Hong Kong Police brutality towards us, the secondary students and Hong Kong citizens.​
​
Respond to the appeal by @ideologisthk​
#policebrutality​
#hkpolicebruality​
#studentslivesmatter​
#hkerlivesmatter ​
​
希望今晚九點，可以準時見到大家。​
​
